column1: length ball at the stumps, defended from the crease
similar line and length, Guptill comes on the front foot and blocks again
a touch fuller this time and Guptill pushes it to the left of mid-off. And he is off the mark with a three as Rubel chases and slides to stop it just inside
short of length around off, hops and drops it down on the leg side
length ball around off, works it towards mid-on gently for an easy single
length ball in the channel, left alone
falls just short of the backward point fielder. Fuller around off but not too full. Angling across as the batsman pushes at it and gets a thick outside edge
straying on the pads and tucked away towards fine leg
short of length outside off, moves away after pitching. Guptill was looking to defend and is beaten
this one coming in with the angle. A touch fuller around off. Guptill gets an inside edge on to the pad and dribbles behind square leg
length, in the channel. Left alone. Good bounce and carry for Taskin there
length ball outside off, swinging late as the batsman shoulders arms again
length ball on the stumps, stays in his crease and tucks it towards forward square leg
length ball around off, defended towards extra cover from back foot
short of length around off, defends it towards covers by opening the face of the bat at the last moment
length outside off, pushed between cover and point for a couple
short of length outside off, Guptill guides it towards third man
fuller on the stumps and flicked away, to the left of mid-on and that's the first four of the day
length outside off, comes forward and chops it towards third man
length ball angling away, Nicholls stays away from hit

length ball around off, takes a step towards the bowler and looks to slash but ends up chopping it towards mid-off. Sets off for a quick single and makes it safely as Mahmudullah fails to gather the ball cleanly
length outside off, comes forward and punches it between cover and point. Superb timing and placement
cuts him in half. A touch fuller from Taskin, just outside off. Guptill was on the front foot but the ball came back in to sneak through the gap between bat and pad
length ball on the stumps, works it around the corner
length ball outside off, comes forward and defends it towards cover. The call was to wait but it goes just to the left of the fielder and they take a single
length ball in the corridor, left alone
beaten Length ball around fifth stump, goes for the cut and misses
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single, not for the first time today. And he makes it safely
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, punched between cover and point again, and they take three
length ball around off, backs away a bit and skips to smash it straight, Ends up mistiming it towards the bowler
short of length around off, punches it towards cover

fuller from Taskin. Width outside off as well and Guptill throws his bat at it. Didn't middle it but got enough on it to clear the point fielder with ease. A couple of bounce before it reaches the boundary

a direct hit and they are checking upstairs. A length ball jagging in. Guptill is cramped. Gets an inside edge on to the pads and the ball drops just next to the stumps. They are going for a single, the backward point fielder charges in, picks it up and breaks the stumps down with an underarm throw diving forward. Nicholls was in though
length ball on the pads, goes for the flick but gets an inside edge on the pads
uses his feet and slashes it over extra cover, not from the middle of the bat. A valiant chase keeps it to three
beaten. A length ball outside off, Nicholls comes forward and looks to defend. It nips back in to sneak through
short of length outside off, rocks back and cuts it square off the wicket for a couple
short of length around middle and off, goes back and flicks it towards midwicket
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards backward square leg and that's good running from Guptill as he realises the fielder is a bit slow to the ball and charges back for the second
short of length around off, punched towards cover-point
short outside off, rocks back and pulls it through midwicket. The deep square leg has a lot of work to do and he keeps it to two
a bouncer at 140.6kph. Nicholls was late on it as he tries to hook it. Misses

dropped by Mushfiqur. Fuller and moving away. Nicholls came down the track and looked to smash it through the off side. Got an outside edge that kept going away from the keeper, who got both hands to it but couldn't hold on
length ball on the pads, misses the flick. An appeal for lbw but it was going down

taken this time, by Liton at gully. It was once again a full-ish delivery from Taskin but not quite there for the drive. Nicholls nonetheless went for it, got a thick outside edge that went straight to the fine gully
a bouncer but way down the leg side and Mushfiqur cannot reach there. Five wides there
short of length in the channel left alone
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards cover-point
short of length around off, stays back and blocks
length ball around off, stays back and defends it towards extra cover

Guptill fails to convert another start. Short outside off, Guptill tried to pull it from there but got only toe end of the bat and it lobbed towards mid-on, and Liton once again made no mistake. Was a dolly this time
short of length around off, defended back
length ball outside off, stays back and punches it towards mid-off
length ball around off, another solid defence. Back towards the bowler
short of length at the stumps, Conway trusts the bounce and leaves a straight ball. It keeps going up and swings in late. Mushfiqur can only get a glove to it and concedes a wide
beaten. Length ball outside off, looks to defend but ends up playing inside the line of the ball
this one nips back in from a length around off. Hits the batsman on the pads as he looks to defend. A mild appeal for lbw. Not out says the umpire. Might have been an inside edge there
a touch fuller and straighter, flicked away but cannot beat square leg
length ball in the channel and moving further away, left alone
length outside off, cuts it behind point for one. Off the mark
length ball outside off, a bit of extra bounce as Taylor looks to defend. Takes the bottom hand off and opens the face of the bat to work it towards cover-point
length outside off, punched towards mid-off
short and wide outside off, cuts it to the right of third man for a couple

another dropped, Mustafizur this time. Was a length ball outside off, Taylor took a step towards the ball and looks to hoick it towards midwicket. Completely mistimed it and it went to the right of the fielder, knee height. He got both hands but couldn't hold on
similar line and length and Taylor nails it this time, goes across the line and slogs it to the right of Mustafizur, he can only be a spectator this time
Taylor fails to make use of the reprieve. A length ball outside off, not enough width. Taylor was stuck between cut and punch and ends up edging it behind the wicket. A regulation catch for Mushfiqur
length ball outside off, looks to push it on the off side, gets an inside edge towards fine leg
short of length outside off and leaving the batsman. Left alone
short of length around off, defended towards cover-point
short of length in the channel, left alone
beaten. A touch fuller from Taskin, in the channel. Conway pushes at it away from the body and gets beaten by some distance
and again. Fuller and a touch closer this time, Conway once again tries to push at it but it swings late to beat the bat
length ball in the channel, left alone
short of length around off, stays back and defends it towards the bowler
short of length at the batsman, tucked away towards short midwicket
fuller and wider and Latham latches on to it, slashes it through covers for four. Off the mark

an appeal for run out as Latham attempts a risky second run. Short of length on the pads, tucked away to the right of fine leg and they are taking on the arm of the fielder. A throw at the keeper's end, who whips off the bails. It's been referred upstairs but Latham was comfortably home
length ball on the stumps, drops it towards square leg and sets off. The fielder charges towards the ball, swoops and throws underarms but it goes way, way over the stumps. Conway was quick though
length ball on the pads, flicked but straight towards square leg
length ball angling away, left alone
length ball in the channel, left alone

length ball on the stumps, came slower off the wicket. Conway was just a touch early into the shot as he looked to flick it away. Does well to adjust so that it doesn't carry to the square leg fielder
length outside off, pushes it towards mid-off on the up, a diving stop there by the fielder to his left
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
top edged, but safe...a good bouncer, Conway goes for the hook and isn't in control but gets some fortune as it flies to fine leg
length ball outside off, played to the on side
turns this off the pads towards square leg
full at off stump, defended to point
on leg stump, doesn't make contact with the pad and bobbles to the on side
back of a length at off stump, defended to the covers
round the wicket, goes on with the air, Latham plays back and knocks it into midwicket
full at off stump, he comes forward and it takes a thickish inside edge to the leg side
not too far from popping a return catch, turns his bat face a touch too early but it doesn't quite carry
pushes forward to a full delivery
pushed square into the off side from the back foot
uses his feet then carefully pushes into midwicket
full at off stump, 136kph, pushed straight back down the pitch
walks across onto off stump, pushes square to the off side for a well-judged single towards point
full at middle and off, defended square into the off side
outside leg stump, turned off the pads towards fine leg
full at off stump, firmly driven to the on side and Hossain gets a hand on it diving to his left
opens the face and angles backward of point
comes forward and pushes into the covers
touch shorter, he plays back and works to midwicket
a little too short outside off, Conway leans back and square cuts behind point. Excellent placement
tapped away
onto the back foot, opens the face and places it through the off side to the cover sweeper
comes down the pitch and there's a big shout for lbw...he's a long way down the track. Tamim consider a review but declined
over the wicket, full outside off, driven to cover
driven firmly back to the bowler who gets down in his follow through
lovely touch by Conway, a length delivery outside off, he's in complete control of this as he angles it through the vacant slip cordon
this is a proper edge! Certainly not in control this time, drives at a full delivery and the edge flies to third man...probably through second slip
that's a beauty! The perfect on drive from Conway, a full delivery on the stumps, takes a small stride forward and plays through the line. Take a photo of that one
full into the pads, flicked through midwicket and good running by Latham makes the second
skips down the pitch, gets taken on the front pad again
opens the face and drives to point
full at off stump, flicked wide of mid-on
angled into the pads from round the wicket, swept away through fine leg...Conway is motoring as the New Zealand hundred comes up
comes forward and pushes to cover
goes for the sweep again, misses this time and is taken on the pads
round the wicket, floated up at the stumps, tapped into midwicket
worked off the pads behind square on the leg side
comes down the pitch, chips in the air over midwicket and it lands safely
uses his feet again, played along the ground to midwicket
pushed off the back foot to mid-on
some width outside off, Latham cuts but picks out point
clipped down the ground to long-on
this one is eased down the ground as well
comes forward and he gives long-on some more work
touch shorter, he plays back and works it from outside off to deep midwicket. Nice placement
knocks a full delivery down the ground
good stride forward and nicely driven through the covers. An over of milking
defended with soft hands
worked off the stumps to midwicket
short and wide, poor delivery, Conway takes advantage as he whips the hands through a square cut that races away
comes forward, takes the pad towards the keeper
pushed to the bowler
flicked strongly off the toes and wide enough of long-on to comfortably allow the second

strikes first ball and a brilliant catch! What a bowling change. Over the wicket, full outside off, Latham drives, the bat twists and he can't keep it down, and it's very well caught at point diving high to his left
short of a length outside off, Mitchell coming out of the crease and plays to mid-on
driven onto the off side
stays in the crease as the keeper comes up to the stumps, square drives to the cover sweeper
driven through the off side
good length outside off, 121kph, hint of shape and defended to cover
uses his feet but can't get to the pitch so thrusts his pad at it
pushed to long-off
worked off the pads and good work at square leg prevents the single
knocks a straight delivery into midwicket
full at off stump, defended
onto the back foot and pushes it straight of midwicket down the ground
nicely bowled! Beats the outside edge with a good-length delivery which nibbles away
almost a leading edge to midwicket, looking to work this onto the on side and was early on the shot
short outside off, driven off the back foot through the covers
good length outside off, played towards point
full outside off, Mitchell comes right across the crease to meet it
back of a length, straight, flicked through midwicket and the boundary-riders can't stop the second
full outside off, big stride and drives to the cover sweeper
angled into the pads, he picks out backward square
comes down the pitch and flicks along the ground through midwicket
full outside off, he drags this drive a little and sends it to long-on
worked off the pads and finds the man at square leg again
uses his feet but the ball isn't quite full enough so he defends to midwicket
full outside off, punched to mid-off inside the ring
on the pads, tucked through square leg
good length outside off, defended back down the pitch
pushes this down the leg side - might have seen Mitchell moving across the crease - Rahim can't gather it
full and straight, worked to mid-on
works this from outside off to midwicket
length ball outside off, chopped down to third man. Apart from that wide, Sarkar doing a good job
worked off the pads through square leg
outside off, square drives to backward point
off the back foot through the covers, and that's fifty for Conway off 52 balls. This international cricket lark is going well
aggression from Mitchell! That's a thumping blow. Comes down the pitch and plays a lovely clean swing through the line over midwicket
pushes a length delivery to midwicket
full at the stumps, defended
dabbed down to third man from outside off
this nips back off a good length, takes a thick inside edge into the pads and bobbles past the stumps
full and straight, driven to mid-on who is deep enough for the single
back of a length outside off, runs down to third man
full outside off, a punchy drive finds cover
nips back again, takes the pad but it's high and angling down leg
full at off stump, pushed perfectly straight down the ground and mid-off is able to get across
swung away! Brings the bottom through against a length delivery, picks it up and heaves over midwicket
full at off stump, defended towards mid-on and spots the chance for a quick single
lovely stroke, comes forward and drives through the covers, the sweeper can get across
full at off stump, opens the face through backward point and wide of third man
full at middle and leg, defended to midwicket
full outside off, driven to the cover sweeper
full and straight, Conway comes forward and gets an inside edge into the pads
short on leg stump, tucked off the hip to long leg
full on the pads, flicked just in front of short fine leg
full outside off, pushed to long-on
driven into the non-striker's stumps and rebounds away
zips through! Short of a length outside off, goes for a big pull shot and it flies over the top edge
steered wide of backward point to third
short of a length, whipped off the pads to deep square leg
chops this over the stumps off an inside edge as he plays forward to a good-length delivery
missed run out! Drops a short-of-a-length delivery into the off side. Starts for the run and gets sent back then slips but cover coming in can't collect cleanly
short outside off, pulls again and this time finds midwicket
length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, punched towards mid-on
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
a slower length ball around off, waits for it and dabs it towards backward point
length outside off, comes on the front foot and pushes it towards mid-off
short of length around off, defended back
length ball around off, Conway taps it towards backward point and looks for a quick single. A loud and early call of no from his partner
fuller around off, presents the full face of the bat but Mustafizur does well to stop it in his followthrough

an appeal for caught-behind. Given not out but Bangladesh opt to review. Was a length ball outside off that kept coming in with the angle as Conway tried to dab it on the off side. He missed and the ball went past the outside edge. There is a spike on UltraEdge but that's from the bat hitting the flap of the back pad. Nothing as the ball passed the outside edge
length outside off, drops it towards backward point in search for a single but it went straight towards the fielder
length outside off, uses his feet this time and steers it towards sweeper cover. Sprints back for the second
length outside off, drives on the up towards sweeper cover. 50 of the stand comes up. And it's a no-ball as well
fuller outside off and Mitchell has smashed it back at the bowler. The ball hits Mustafizur hand as he tries to take evasive action
hoicked across the line. Short of length around off and went wide of long-on for four. Finds the gap
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep-backward point
short of length on the leg stump, misses the pull as Sarkar rolled his fingers over it. Collects a leg-bye as the ball drops on the leg side. A direct hit at the bowler's end but Conway was home
length ball around off, pushes it towards midwicket
short of length outside off, punches it towards extra cover
fuller outside off, looks to drive but the base ins't stable. The bottom hand comes off as Conway gets an inside edge towards square leg
length ball angling across, pulls it towards midwicket
walks down and across and flicks this length ball around off, which is now on the pads, over backward square leg. Stylishly done
short of length outside off, chops it down towards third man
short of length around off, transfers the weight back and works it towards short midwicket
length ball around off, works it towards long-on
short of length around off, gets on his toes and tucks it behind square leg
reverse sweep from Mitchell. More like a reverse slap. Fuller outside off and he smashed it aerially, to the right of short third man
tries the reverse sweep again but fails to middle it this time as the bowler slowed it down and bowled on a length. A single to third man
length outside off, pushes it towards backward point
fuller on the stumps, sweeps it towards short fine leg. A partial, tumbling stop there but only a single
length ball on the stumps, punches it down the ground
now Conway tries the reverse sweep, gets the under edge that dribbles to the left of Mushfiqur
length ball on the stumps, pushed gently towards midwicket. The fielder is at the boundary and that allows the second run. Conway sprints back to beat the throw
length outside off, mistimes the cut towards covers. Mitchell wanted a single but the extra cover was quick to the ball. Conway sends his partner back just in time
length ball around off, tucked away towards midwicket
fuller on the pads and Conway picks it up once again, flicked to the right of the deep square leg fielder
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards wide long-on. Only a single this time
length outside off, comes forward and pushes it through covers
a low full toss on the pads, flicked away but straight towards square leg. Missed out there
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards long-on
fuller outside off and Conway sweeps it in front of square. Flat, in the air and away from any fielder. Moves to 80
flatter and quicker outside off, reverse-sweeps it towards short third man
length outside off, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground. A single to backward point
length ball at the stumps, backs away and goes for the cut but cannot beat the cover fielder
length ball on the stumps, drops it on the leg side for a quick single even as the bowler fields it himself
fuller around off, skips down and looks to go aerial towards long-off. Gets a thick outside edge towards third man
a bouncer, a touch over his head. Conway pulls it down towards deep square leg
another short one. Goes for the pull, gets a top edge over the keeper's head. And that's fifty for Mitchell, 52 off 63 balls
slower length ball around off, tucked away towards backward square. Another milestone: hundred of the stand comes up
fuller on the stumps, flicked in front of square leg but only a single
length outside off, goes back and flicks it towards midwicket
a low full toss around off, driven towards long-on
fuller down the leg side. Gets low and sweeps it fine, between short fine leg and deep square leg even as the bottom hand comes off. He is 90s now
back-to-back fours. Short of length, rocks back and pulls it through midwicket
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
short of length outside off, looks to force it aerially off the back foot but doesn't get much power behind that. A single to long-off
too full on the stumps, flicked towards deep midwicket for a couple. Moves to 97
slower length ball outside off, pushes at it but extra cover slides to his left to make the stop
short, down the leg side and pulled away but it went straight to short fine leg. Missed out there

maiden ODI hundred of Conway, off just 95 balls. Short of length outside off, rocks back and smashes it through point for four. A brilliant innings from the left-hander to pull New Zealand out from trouble. Standing ovation from the crowd
length ball around off, punches it towards long-off
short of length outside off, backs away and cuts but cannot beat extra cover
short and pulled towards deep midwicket. Straight to the fielder
short of length outside off, goes for the aerial cut but misses
slower length ball, well outside off, taps it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but gets an under edge past the stumps. A single to short fine leg
length ball around off, clears his front foot and goes up and over mid-off. Clears him easily and the long-on cannot cut it off either despite the valiant effort
fuller around off, drives it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, hits it towards deep midwicket for a couple. That's 250 up for New Zealand
Mahmudullah puts one down. Short outside off, goes for the pull but isn't control of it. A top edge goes towards short fine leg. Mahmudullah pedals back, settles under it but grasses it in the end
fuller on the stumps, smashed back but Taskin stops it in his followthrough
in the blockhole. Digs it out towards mid-off
fuller outside off, looks to hit it hard through the off side but ends up mistiming it towards the bowler
fuller outside off, smashes it through backward point. Didn't bother keeping it down
short of length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket for a couple
short of length outside off, cuts it behind point this time and Taskin makes a mess of it while trying to cut it off at third man. Goes through his hands
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on. Mustafizur fields himself
119.4kph, a slower one angling away. Looks to smash it over mid-off but misses
a low full toss outside off, looks to slog it on the leg side. Gets an inside edge on to his foot
almost in the blockhole. Just outside off. Digs it out towards long-on
fuller around off, frees his arms to hit it towards long-on. Didn't middle it I think
length ball around off, goes for the pull, gets a thick outside edge over backward point
almost in the blockhole. Hits it towards long-on to bring up 150 of the stand
shades of Klusener in that. A slower one from Rubel. Conway stands with a firm base and swings at it to dispatch it through extra cover
even better. Rubel goes fuller outside off. Conway opens the face of the bat to steer it squarer this time, four through covers
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover

fuller on the stumps, Conway goes aerial with the angle but ends up hitting straight into the lap of deep midwicket. An excellent innings comes to an end. A standing ovation from the crowd, applause all around as he walks back
length ball angling across. Looks to slog it over deep midwicket. Misses
a slower one this time. Length outside off, goes for the cut but misses again
fuller outside off at 140kph, hits it towards extra cover

another cutter. Neesham was late to spot it, it spins back in as he looks to dab it towards third man. The ball drops on the pitch and they sneak in a quick single even as Mustafizur fields the ball in his followthrough but takes a touch long to collect and aim at the non-striker's end. No direct hit though
fuller outside off, steered towards third man but that's a no ball for overstepping
fuller on the stumps, moves across and scoops it over short fine leg to find the boundary
almost in the blockhole. Drills it towards long-on
length ball around off. Goes for the pull but doesn't get hold of it. More of a top edge but it lands safe. They get two to deep midwicket as the fielder fumbles

length ball outside off, Neesham goes for the pull again. It hit towards the lower part of the bat, the bat too twisting at the point of contact. Goes high in the air and an easy catch for deep midwicket
a high full toss on the stumps and pulled away over deep square leg, all the way for a six. Was very close to be called no-ball for height
in the blockhole, digs it out on the leg side for one
fuller and angling away. Mitchell stays back, fetches it and hits it straight over the bowler's head. 300 is up for New Zealand
short of length at the batsman, Mitchell is standing deep and outside off. Pulls it fine and beats the fielder at fine leg
four off the glove. Short of length down the leg side. Goes for the pull, and it just beats the keeper. And it's a front-foot no-ball

a full toss outside off, smashes it to the left of long-off. And they are coming back for the second. Mitchell wants the strike back. The throw is at his end but not quick enough to beat the batsman who drags his bat and reaches home before the keeper beaks the stumps
a wide full toss once again, hits it towards long-off and calls for two straightaway. This time it went straight to the fielder, so only a single. Moves to 98
short of length outside off, goes up and over covers. The deep extra cover comes across to flick it back as batsmen go for the third

a full toss outside off, Mitchell moves back and across and flicks it towards deep midwicket. The fielder is quick to the ball, no way there is a second in there. The throw is a bat wayward though. There was still a chance of a run out had Mushfiqur collected it cleanly but he fumbles, juggles the ball as Mitchell completes the second run and his maiden ODI hundred
length ball in the channel, looks to defend but ends up playing inside the line and misses
length ball at the stumps, pushed back
fuller outside off, driven but straight towards mid-off
length ball in the channel. Left alone. On the bounce to the keeper
length ball at the stumps, comes forward and blocks
and that's a maiden. Length ball angling across, not much movement there for Henry. Left alone
fuller on the stumps, a bit of a hint of swing. Flicked over backward square leg for four. Off the mark in style
shortens his length and angles it across Liton. Looks to push at it and gets beaten
length ball at the stumps, some extra bounce as well. Liton takes his bottom hand off and defends
length outside off, pushes it towards mid-off and sets off
length ball on the hips, tucked away towards square leg. Liton sprints across. Santner aims at the keeper's end but misses
fuller around off, drives it down the ground beating mid-off. Both mid-off and and mid-on put in the chase but the ball wins
short of length outside off, punches it towards cover
Tamim departs, a big blow for Bangladesh. A length ball around off from Henry, seams just a tiny bit away to kiss the outside edge of the bat as Tamim looks to defend. Latham does the rest
short of length outside off, hops and dabs it towards gully
length ball around middle and off, defended
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on to get off the mark
length outside off, nips back in with some extra bounce to sneak in through the gap between bat and pad. Latham fails to collect cleanly and conceded a bye
length ball around middle and leg. tucked away towards square leg
short of length angling across, pulls it towards forward square leg
length outside off and going across. Goes for the cut and misses
length ball angling away, dabs it towards third man for one
length ball around off and middle. Stays back and blocks
length ball angling towards the pads, looks to tuck it away but misses and is hit on the thigh
fuller outside off, Liton comes forward and drives it through covers for four
short of length outside off, punches it towards mid-off for one
short of length, goes for the pull but ends up hitting it in the air towards fine leg. Boult takes a couple of steps to his right and settles under it. Henry has his second. Bangladesh in trouble
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg. Straight to Santner who looks to throw it to the keeper but ends up throwing it wayward as the ball sticks in his hand and concedes an overthrow
length outside off, chops it towards third man
fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it in front of square leg
fuller outside off, goes for the drive but cannot beat extra cover
a bouncer from Boult. Das ducks under it comfortably
short and pulled towards deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, swings back a bit to beat the bat and hit the batsman high on the thigh. An appeal for lbw but that was going over
length ball around off, defended square of the wicket on the off side
length ball around off, a big front-foot stride and defended towards mid-off
short of length around off, moves across and defends it towards square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it past the diving mid-on fielder. Nicholls chases it and keeps it to three
short of length outside off, steered to the right of gully where Neesham's acrobatic stop prevents any runs
length ball outside off, comes on the front foot and taps it to the left of extra cover
length outside off, dabs it towards backward point

Trent Boult has pulled off a blinder. A length ball outside off, Liton went for the pull only to top edge it towards third man. Boult ran to his left, dived full length and plucked it out with his outstretched left hand. Fingertips. Henry cannot believe it as he picks up his third wicket
fuller outside off and swinging in, goes for the drive but fails to middle. Was in the air as he drives it back
short of length at the batsman, was looking to pull but was late and the ball just drops on the pitch
short of length at the batsman, defended on the back foot
too full around off, drives it towards cover
short of length outside off, defended on the off side
length ball around middle and swinging in, hits him on the thigh as the batsman misses the flick
fuller outside off, goes for the drive but it swings back in to beat the inside edge
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball around off, defended right under his eyes
length outside off, defended on the off side
length outside off, stays back and defends it towards gully
length ball on middle and leg, looks to flick but closes the face of a bat a touch too early. The ball hits the leading edge and falls in front of the batsman
fuller but down the leg side and swings further down. The keeper had no chance
length ball in the channel, slanting across. Left alone
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur was looking to pull but decides to stays away from it in the end
short of length angling away. Squares up the batsman. Extra bounce means the ball hits the shoulder of the bat and goes behind point
length ball in the channel, left alone
short of length outside off, defended towards cover-point from the back foot
length outside off, defends it square of the wicket on the off side
length ball around off and middle. Tucked away towards square leg
length ball outside off, stays back and defends it towards gully
uses his feet, gives himself some room and looks to go over mid-on. Doesn't time it well but clears the fielder. Gets a couple
length ball outside off, extra bounce and nips back. Beats the inside edge. An appeal for lbw but too high
length ball on the stumps, defended on the leg side
too full on the pads, clipped towards fine leg
length ball in the channel. Left alone
a bit fuller and wider outside off, drives it aerially past the backward point. Third man cuts it off
fuller in the channel. Drives at it and misses as he plays down the wrong line
length ball in the channel, nips away a bit. Left alone
length ball around off, moves across and flicks it towards fine leg
length ball in the channel, left alone
length ball around off, punched back firmly. Henry stop it in his followthrough
length ball on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
length ball around off, looks to work it on the leg side, gets an outside edge towards gully. Well short
a bouncer this time, goes for the pull but fails to connect. Called a wide
goes over second slip. Short of length around off, Mithun end sup fending at it. The ball hits near the shoulder of the bat and lobs over the cordon
hits him high on the bat as Mushfiqur looks to defend this length ball
short of length outside off, good bounce and pace. Mushfiqur sways away
fuller on the pads, looks to flick but misses. Off the pad to the keeper
fuller outside off, moves in a bit. Mithun comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on

given caught-behind but Mithun wants to review it. A length ball outside off which comes in off the seam. The batsman pushes at it and misses. The ball sneaks in through and hits the back thigh on its way to the keeper. For the lbw, the impact was umpire's call but it was too high
short of length ball, coming in to the batsman who defends it on the leg side
fuller outside off, pushes it towards extra cover
short of length but way outside off
length ball around off, stays back and defends towards cover-point
length ball outside off, taps it towards backward point where the fielder fumble
fuller outside off, room to free the arms. Mithun smashes it but finds Santner in the way
short of length, moves across and pulls it towards fine leg. Was in the air but well short
beaten. Length outside off, moves away after pitching and beats the bat
short of length outside off, defended
length outside off, dabs it towards Taylor at wide first slip. Just short of him
short of length in the channel, left alone
length ball in the corridor, shouldered arms
fuller outside off, a hint of away movement, left alone once again
beaten. Length ball around fourth stump, looks to defend but is beaten. Played inside the line
fuller around off, comes forward and taps it towards cover. Takes off before retracing his steps as the fielder is quick to the ball
fuller on the stumps, clipped towards fine leg for a couple
full outside off, driven firmly to cover
a shorter delivery, pulled to deep square
short outside off, gets over the top of it and square cuts straight to point
back of a length at off stump, hint of shape in, pushed to cover
finds the gap this time as he cuts again, but it's straight to third man
nicely bowled, moves away outside off, Rahim may have held his bat inside the line
well bowled, spicy delivery, short of a length and jumps and Rahim who does well to fend it down to the leg side
good length outside off, Mithun across the crease and defends to point
in the channel outside off, defended
that's a good one, full outside off and zips away off the seam, climbs through to Latham
short of a length, 134kph, defended towards gully
tries to be aggressive...and caught at deep square leg! Mithun tries to take on the short delivery, goes for the pull from outside off, takes a top edge and Santner settles comfortably
back of a length, straight, tucked into midwicket
squared up a touch, takes a thick outside edge down to third man
rolls his wrists on a pull to deep square

missed by Boult! (Although would have been another blinder). It was flying off the bat, a crunching pull, and Boult couldn't get a hand on it at square leg but, as we've seen, he can take some special catches. Powerful stroke
tucked off the pads into the on side
full toss outside off, a slower ball, driven into the covers and that was out with a direct hit from Boult
nicely forward into a full delivery, eased through the covers
back of a length, angling in, misses the bat and takes the thigh pad
misses the drive as he plays well away from his body
short of a length at off stump, 133kph, played to the on side
fuller at off stump, shapes in, played off the front foot and runs into the leg side
top-edged for six! Starts with a short ball, Mahmudullah hooks and isn't in control but gets enough on it over fine leg
fuller, straight, gets inside the line and flicks into square leg
not the best start from Mitchell as he fires this one well down the leg side
that's better, full at middle and off, defended
full at the stumps, clipped to midwicket
that's a top shot, a full delivery at off stump and a delightful punched drive straight down the ground
short of a length outside off, square drives to point
full at middle and off, defended
terrific bouncer! Not far from the helmet. Started outside off stump and followed Mahmudullah as he ducked underneath
back of a length outside off, 137kph, more shape into the right hander and it's defended
nips back off the seam from a good length, zips past the inside edge and takes the pad
good length outside off, opens the face and manages to beat gully
back of a length outside off, left alone and Latham takes it at head height
worked off the pads to long leg
short on off stump, gets over the top and pulls in front of square
plays away from his body at some width, takes more top edge that middle but safely down to third man
worked off the stumps to midwicket
full and straight, clipped to deep midwicket
extra bounce outside off, flies over the top edge as he looks to play square
simple return catch! Sends down a short ball, goes for the pull and it's spliced into the on side...Neesham skips across from his follow through
full at off stump, 133kph, defended
well held at point! That's a sharp one. Width outside off, Mehidy goes for the square drive and Conway snaffles it at ankle height. Neesham knows that wasn't his best ball
good length outside off, nice carry through to the keeper
full outside off, left alone
a bouncer angled down the leg side
length delivery outside off, guided to point
full at off stump, touch of nibble, defended
opens the face and plays into gully
shorter delivery, pulled off one leg backward of square
a bottom-handed flick to a length delivery, sends this in the air towards deep square
full and straight, whipped off the pads to long leg
short outside off, back cuts and it's well fielded at gully by Guptill
beats the edge with a delivery in the channel just outside off
full at middle and off, squared up in defence
another one for Neesham as Mahedi goes for the pull and gets a thin edge...a profitable few overs for the allrounder
round the wicket, full at off stump, defended to midwicket
short of a length, defended to the on side
back over the wicket, short and wide outside off, Taskin misses his drive
short of a length, pulled to deep midwicket
full outside off, a crunching drive through the covers. Nice stroke
short outside off, drops his hands and lets it go through
played to the off side
round the wicket, full outside off, defended
over the wicket, a loopy slower-ball full toss outside off which is pushed to point
goes for a pull, takes a bottom edge into the thigh pad
very short outside off, Latham has to leap to take that
back of a length outside off, chopped into the ground and it bounces to gully
full at the stumps, worked to midwicket
another bouncer, on off stump at 134kph, beats the top edge as he pulls
nearly chopped on! Short of a length, played down by his feet and it bounces close to off stump
full at off stump, defended to the bowler
over the wicket, short of a length on off stump, played to backward point
comes round the wicket, finds an inside edge which scoots over leg stump to fine leg
full at off stump, clipped to square leg
short outside off, sways out of the line
full outside off, 132kph, pushed to mid-on
comes forward into a full delivery, played to cover
over the wicket, good length at middle and off, defended
connects nicely with a pull out to deep square
beats the edge as he comes forward and drives at a full delivery
that's a beauty, full outside off, brings him onto the front foot and curls past the edge
this is played unconvincingly as he's wafting away from his body at a short-of-a-length delivery
full at off stump, late swing, defended to point
full outside off, defended towards point
a short delivery, pulls without much timing into midwicket
wild swing! Short outside off and Taskin aims to send that over midwicket but doesn't make contact
full at the pads, clipped to long leg
short of a length into the hip, glances into the leg side
round the wicket, ducks underneath a 132kph bouncer
length outside off, goes for the cut and misses
an inswinging yorker, Mahmudullah does well get some bat on it and dig it out towards forward square leg
length outside off, pushes it towards covers
cuts him in half. 135kph from Boult. Pitching on a length and swinging back in to leave Mahmudullah hopping. Looks like he got some inside edge on it and it went to the left of the keeper
length outside off, takes a single to third man
length ball around off, blocked by Taskin
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg for one
short of length around off, gets on his toes and defends it towards cover

Henry gets his fourth. Length ball at the stumps, Taskin clears his front leg and looks to slog it on the leg side. Gets an outside edge that balloons towards extra cover. An easy catch for Conway, Bangladesh lose their eighth
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
in the blockhole. Rubel jams his bat at it to keep it out
tucked one behind square but they don't take the single
Boult starts the new over with a bounder. Mahmudullah sways away
short again, at the body this time. Fended off on the leg side
short of length around off, worked towards square leg, and he takes the single
fuller and wider outside off, Rubel was moving towards the leg side and leaves it alone
fuller and wider, tries to reach for it and fails to get anything on it
fuller and wider outside off, left alone
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover point
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off
length ball at the stumps, defended from the back foot
a touch fuller on middle and leg, defended on the front foot
fuller around off, turns it towards square leg
too full on the stumps, turns it towards square leg
length ball at the stumps, works it towards square leg. Doesn't take the single
short and pulled down towards fine leg. And they take the single this time
fails to get the yorker right. Full but away from the stumps, left alone
length ball angling in, Rubel goes for the drive but misses
goes for the yorker, just outside off. Rubel gets his bat down in time
gets the yorker right but Rubel is alert and jams his bat at it. And it bounces past the stumps
short of length at the stumps, punched towards long-on from the back foot
length ball around off, flicked towards square leg
length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
length outside off, goes back and pushes it towards extra cover
short of length, goes back and helps it over short midwicket
length ball at the stumps, goes for the pull but misses. An appeal for lbw but denied. Think the impact was outside leg
short and pulled away, right from the middle of the bat. All the way for a six over deep-backward square leg
Boult goes short again and this too has been pulled away. A couple of bounces into the deep-backward square leg boundary
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length angling across, goes back and across and flicks it towards deep square leg
fuller at the stumps, defended awkwardly but defended
length ball around off, gets behind this and blocks. Boult finishes wicketless
length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
length ball angling in towards the pads, tucked away to square leg
almost in the blockhole. Digs it out towards short midwicket
fuller outside off, driven towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, looks to defend but gets beaten by turn and bounce
slower and fuller outside off, defended on the front foot
fuller around off, pushes it towards mid-on
length ball outside off, taps it towards point
a bouncer, Mahmudullah goes down and drops his hands. Called a no-ball though. Has to be for overstepping
that's fifty for Mahmudullah. Fuller outside off from Jamieson, Mahmudullah clears his front leg and smash it towards deep midwicket boundary
short of length at the batsman, hops, moves inside the line and flicks it towards fine leg
a bouncer, angling in towards the batsman. Rubel backs away and stays low
goes for the yorker but Rubel is up to it. Keeps his front leg away and jams his bat at it to steer it towards backward point
a flat six. Length ball around off, backs away and smashes it over deep midwicket
a bouncer outside off, moves across and pulls it down towards deep square leg. They are looking for the second but Rubel sends Mahmudullah back wisely
fuller on the stumps, clipped towards fine leg
fuller outside off and that's a delightful cover drive for four
low full toss driven down the ground
short of a length, tucked backward of square on the leg side
moves outside leg and misses his attempted thrash through the covers
short of length around off, swings across. Gets a top edge that bounces well short of third man
length ball outside off, pulls it through the gap at midwicket
short, well outside off, goes for the pull. Gets a top edge that flies over the keeper's head, all the way for a six. Moves to 76. These two have added 52 now
another bouncer. Mahmudullah lets it go. Think that was very close to a wide
length ball around off, Rubel looks to drive on the up. Gets a healthy outside edge and Latham completes the catch
fuller outside off, goes for the drive but gets beaten
a brilliant yorker but Mustafizur gets his bat on it to keep it out

given lbw but Bangladesh want to review this. A low full toss on the stumps, Mustafizur moves across and looks to flick but misses. The impact is in line and the wickets is umpire's call. So that stays out. Neesham finishes with 5 for 27, his best in ODI cricket
